author: David A. Embury
description: A Daiquiri made with flavoursome honey in place of sugar, or a Bee's Knees with rum in place of gin. However you view this, it's damn tasty.
name: Honeysuckle Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
20 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
If using honey rather than pre-diluted honey syrup, then STIR 3 spoons of runny honey with citrus juices in base of shaker until honey dissolves
Add the rum, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
